On the surface this just looks like a very basic video but underneath the hood it is the start of something great! I am making a video generating app using Veo3. This is a React App that is using the Gemini Veo3 API. Right now it allows you to just put in a prompt or give a short description of what you want to make. End goal is to allow you to chat with AI to create a script for a short video and then create all of the scenes and then make the video. I will keep you posted on the progress.

Epic Drone Chase – Warsaw by Night
Nighttime Warsaw. A single long, continuous shot. Third-person view — the drone is always visible in front of the camera, as in a video game. The drone flies dynamically between Warsaw’s beautifully illuminated skyscrapers, with a strong sense of speed. It alternates between low passes over the streets (weaving around pedestrians at a safe height) and high climbs above the rooftops, revealing the skyline. The camera always stays “from behind,” no cuts.
Mandatory sign: During a low pass over a central city square, show a large illuminated tourist sign that reads exactly: I 
 WARSZAWA.
 • The heart is a red heart symbol, not the word “love”.
 • Keep the exact spelling and casing: WARSZAWA in ALL CAPS. Do not translate, add, remove, or change any characters.
 • Hold the sign clearly in frame for at least 2–3 seconds as the drone passes. Optionally revisit it once more later from above.
Movements are smooth and daring: tight gaps between buildings, then dramatic climbs above the skyline. Visuals are highly realistic and vivid, with intense city lights reflecting in glass façades.
Sound design: Realistic drone rotor whir that changes with speed and distance; authentic night city ambience (traffic, distant voices, wind), mixed according to what is on screen at each moment.

The orange blossom morphs into a fresh mint sprig. Accompanied solely by the singer's own acoustic guitar playing—gentle, rhythmic strums building to emotional swells—creating a stripped-down, intimate arrangement typical of K-Pop acoustic versions or OST tracks, with a tempo around 70-80 BPM for a slow, heartfelt pace. No additional instruments or backing tracks; emphasize the raw, live feel to heighten the emotional connection.Camera Movement:• Starting Position: Wide full shot from approximately 30 meters away, capturing the entire café scene to establish the setting and the singer's solitary figure in the space, allowing viewers to feel the initial distance and gradual pull-in• Movement: Slow, smooth dolly-in over about 10 meters (lasting 20-30 seconds), gradually closing in on the singer to build intimacy; maintain a steady pace to mirror the song's emotional build-up, with subtle camera tilts or pans to follow her guitar playing and facial expressions without distracting from the performance• Ending: Seamless transition to a medium-wide shot that frames the singer from the waist up, including the guitar and her immediate surroundings, to linger on the final emotional notes and allow the mood to resonateOverall Mood: Warm, emotional, and deeply nostalgic, with a bittersweet undertone that draws viewers into the singer's world of longing and reflection. Emphasize close-ups on her facial expressions—eyes glistening with unshed tears, subtle smiles tinged with sadness, and passionate delivery—to convey vulnerability and authenticity. The direction should create an immersive, intimate atmosphere, making the audience feel like they're eavesdropping on a personal moment in the café, fostering empathy and emotional resonance through the K-Pop style's melodic storytelling and the raw acoustic performance. Lighting should be soft and golden-hour inspired, with shallow depth of field from the f/1.2 lens to blur backgrounds and focus sharply on the singer's eyes, hands on the guitar, and expressions for maximum impact.

In Poland 
A video in the style of amateur phone footage, recorded while running through a modern city street at night in heavy rain. The ground is wet, reflecting streetlights, vehicle headlights, and occasional bright flashes from explosions and lightning. Camera is handheld and very shaky, with sudden erratic movements caused by panic and running. The image often loses focus for a moment.
In the sky above the city skyline, a massive UFO hovers very low. It is dark metallic with large panels of bright white, blue, and red lights that pulse slowly. The UFO is partially covered by rain clouds and illuminated by both lightning and nearby explosions.
On the street, chaos is everywhere: civilians are running, screaming, slipping on wet pavement, pushing each other. Several military vehicles and armed soldiers are present, firing at an unseen target. Some cars are abandoned with doors open, alarms sounding.
Occasional video glitches: horizontal static lines, compression artifacts, and frame freezes lasting less than one second. The overall video quality is similar to a consumer smartphone in low light: grainy image, muted colors, visible noise, no cinematic grading.
The audio contains multiple layered sounds: loud rain hitting the microphone, gunfire, distant explosions, car alarms, shouting soldiers, and frightened civilians speaking Polish in a spontaneous, chaotic manner. Voices are panicked and overlapping, with phrases like “Uciekaj!”, “Boże, co to jest?!”, “Tam! Tam leci!”, “Biegnij!”, “Zamknij drzwi!”, “O nie, o nie…!”. These should sound like real people in panic, recorded live in the street, not like scripted or studio-recorded lines. Wind causes occasional microphone distortion.
No background music. No ASMR-style effects. The entire scene should feel raw, unstable, and uncontrolled, as if captured by a terrified bystander.

name: The Sun-Stitcher
duration: 8s
setting:
  location: A sunlit room in a traditional Tunisian home.
  time: 11:00 AM, bright morning.
  subject: An old woman's hands mending a dark, torn piece of fabric.
atmosphere: Serene, magical, and heartwarming.
concept:
  magic: The woman's needle has no thread. Instead, she dips it into a sunbeam, catching a strand of pure, golden light, and uses this light to stitch the tear.
style:
  genre: Magical Realism, Contemplative Art.
  camera: Macro lens, extreme close-up on the hands, needle, and fabric.
  lighting: High-contrast. A single, sharp sunbeam is the key light.
timeline:
  - '0-3s': An extreme close-up on the woman's weathered hands holding a needle.
  - '3-8s': SLOW-MOTION. She dips the needle into the sunbeam, pulls out a glowing thread of pure light, and makes a perfect, luminous stitch in the dark fabric.
audio:
  music: A gentle, solo Oud melody.
  sfx: The soft sound of cloth, a magical 'shimmer' as the light-thread is pulled.

[SFX: "crack!" + squish]
The two halves separate slowly, revealing a small, vibrant green frog sitting where the seed was.
Its back is smooth like avocado flesh, and the pit remains stuck on its head like a helmet.
[SFX: "ribbit!" + tiny echo]
The frog blinks, looks curious, then leaps toward the camera.
[SFX: "boing!" springy jump]

A cinematic wide shot showing Venom standing menacingly on the left, hulking black body glistening with a slick, organic sheen. White spider emblem pulsating on his chest, long tongue twitching, subtle muscle movement as he shifts in place, deep snarls under his breath. On the right, a massive vampire bat perches on a twisted dead tree branch - leathery wings slowly folding and unfolding, red eyes glowing faintly, claws gripping the bark tightly. The scene is set in a moody nighttime forest, under a blood-red moon, with fog crawling along the ground.Suddenly, dark tendrils of black symbiote matter begin to slither across the ground between them. A faint hum grows louder. Crimson energy pulses. The bat screeches and Venom roars. A violent swirl of black goo, bone textures, and glowing red veins wraps the frame. Wings stretch, limbs morph, and a wave of shadow rips through the scene.The fusion ends with a dramatic zoom as the final hybrid form stands revealed a monstrous winged creature with Venom's muscular build and tar-like surface, massive bat wings stretching wide, fanged mouth dripping with fluid, glowing red eyes piercing the darkness. The spider emblem remains etched across its chest, pulsing with life. It spreads its wings, lets out a bone-rattling screech, and launches into the night as the camera slowly tilts upward, with eerie atmospheric music and distant thunder rolling in the background.

“Yo!” 30’sIs a fully-AI ad re-creation of a real ad for Bang & Olufsen. My intention was to prove how ai workflows can be used for final output production and not just for memes or social media fun.All prompts used were descriptive normal texts and no Json format. And yes, there was a Wan generation clip in there.Music used was royalty free from youtube and edited using Adobe Premiere.

Epic Drone Chase – Warsaw by NightNighttime Warsaw. A single long, continuous shot. Third-person view — the drone is always visible in front of the camera, as in a video game. The drone flies dynamically between Warsaw’s beautifully illuminated skyscrapers, with a strong sense of speed. It alternates between low passes over the streets (weaving around pedestrians at a safe height) and high climbs above the rooftops, revealing the skyline. The camera always stays “from behind,” no cuts.Mandatory sign: During a low pass over a central city square, show a large illuminated tourist sign that reads exactly: I  WARSZAWA. • The heart is a red heart symbol, not the word “love”. • Keep the exact spelling and casing: WARSZAWA in ALL CAPS. Do not translate, add, remove, or change any characters. • Hold the sign clearly in frame for at least 2–3 seconds as the drone passes. Optionally revisit it once more later from above.Movements are smooth and daring: tight gaps between buildings, then dramatic climbs above the skyline. Visuals are highly realistic and vivid, with intense city lights reflecting in glass façades.Sound design: Realistic drone rotor whir that changes with speed and distance; authentic night city ambience (traffic, distant voices, wind), mixed according to what is on screen at each moment.

The cocktail umbrella smoothly transforms into a delicate orange blossom flower on the rim.Camera Movement: The drone camera zooms out slightly while orbiting clockwise, showing more of the glowing bokeh background, while the glass keeps rotating counter-clockwise.Transition: The orange juice ripples as its color and garnish prepare for the next transformation.Frame 3 – Lemonade with MintDrink: The orange juice seamlessly becomes pale-yellow lemonade. The orange blossom morphs into a fresh mint sprig. The same ice remains visible.Camera Movement: The drone camera shifts to a top-down orbit, circling clockwise from above while the glass keeps spinning counter-clockwise.Ending: The scene ends on a cinematic hero shot of the lemonade, glistening with condensation against the dreamy blurred background lights.Transitions & Motion (consistent across frames):Glass rotates counter-clockwise at a steady pace throughout.Camera rotates clockwise with a distinct style in each frame (close orbit, zoom out, top-down).Liquids ripple and morph smoothly — no cuts, no jumps.Garnishes transform naturally: cocktail umbrella → orange blossom → mint sprig.Audio (optional):Soft fizz throughout, subtle ripple during transformations, and gentle cinematic whoosh matching the camera motion. The café should feel inviting yet melancholic, enhancing the emotional depth of the performance.Main Subject:• Gender: Female singer-songwriter• Age: Appears in her mid-20s, with a youthful yet expressive demeanor• Hair: Short, vibrant grey hair styled in a neat bob cut that frames her face softly, with subtle waves for added texture• Face: Large, expressive doe-like eyes that convey deep emotion, a slender and delicate oval-shaped face with high cheekbones, fair skin, and subtle makeup emphasizing natural beauty (e.g., light eyeliner to highlight eyes and a soft pink lip tint)• Outfit: White sleeveless top made of lightweight, flowing fabric for a casual yet elegant look, paired with slim-fit jeans or a simple skirt to allow freedom of movement while playing the guitar; minimal accessories like a delicate necklace to keep focus on her performance• Posture: Half-seated on a high wooden stool at a small café table, with an acoustic guitar resting comfortably on her lap; she strums the guitar gently with her right hand while holding the neck with her left, leaning slightly forward into the microphone (if present) or directly toward the camera, her body language reflecting immersion in the song—occasional subtle sways or closed eyes during emotional peaks• Action: The singer is performing live, playing the acoustic guitar herself with skilled, fluid fingerpicking and strumming patterns that complement her vocals; her performance should feel authentic and personal, as if sharing a heartfelt story in a private settingMusic: K-Pop style ballad infused with nostalgic and melancholic themes, sung entirely in Korean language; the song evokes feelings of longing, lost love, or cherished memories (e.g., lyrics about reminiscing on past moments under a starry sky or missing a distant loved one). Accompanied solely by the singer's own acoustic guitar playing—gentle, rhythmic strums building to emotional swells—creating a stripped-down, intimate arrangement typical of K-Pop acoustic versions or OST tracks, with a tempo around 70-80 BPM for a slow, heartfelt pace. No additional instruments or backing tracks; emphasize the raw, live feel to heighten the emotional connection.Camera Movement:• Starting Position: Wide full shot from approximately 30 meters away, capturing the entire café scene to establish the setting and the singer's solitary figure in the space, allowing viewers to feel the initial distance and gradual pull-in• Movement: Slow, smooth dolly-in over about 10 meters (lasting 20-30 seconds), gradually closing in on the singer to build intimacy; maintain a steady pace to mirror the song's emotional build-up, with subtle camera tilts or pans to follow her guitar playing and facial expressions without distracting from the performance• Ending: Seamless transition to a medium-wide shot that frames the singer from the waist up, including the guitar and her immediate surroundings, to linger on the final emotional notes and allow the mood to resonateOverall Mood: Warm, emotional, and deeply nostalgic, with a bittersweet undertone that draws viewers into the singer's world of longing and reflection. Emphasize close-ups on her facial expressions—eyes glistening with unshed tears, subtle smiles tinged with sadness, and passionate delivery—to convey vulnerability and authenticity. The direction should create an immersive, intimate atmosphere, making the audience feel like they're eavesdropping on a personal moment in the café, fostering empathy and emotional resonance through the K-Pop style's melodic storytelling and the raw acoustic performance. Lighting should be soft and golden-hour inspired, with shallow depth of field from the f/1.2 lens to blur backgrounds and focus sharply on the singer's eyes, hands on the guitar, and expressions for maximum impact.

In Poland A video in the style of amateur phone footage, recorded while running through a modern city street at night in heavy rain. The ground is wet, reflecting streetlights, vehicle headlights, and occasional bright flashes from explosions and lightning. Camera is handheld and very shaky, with sudden erratic movements caused by panic and running. The image often loses focus for a moment.In the sky above the city skyline, a massive UFO hovers very low. It is dark metallic with large panels of bright white, blue, and red lights that pulse slowly. The UFO is partially covered by rain clouds and illuminated by both lightning and nearby explosions.On the street, chaos is everywhere: civilians are running, screaming, slipping on wet pavement, pushing each other. Several military vehicles and armed soldiers are present, firing at an unseen target. Some cars are abandoned with doors open, alarms sounding.Occasional video glitches: horizontal static lines, compression artifacts, and frame freezes lasting less than one second. The overall video quality is similar to a consumer smartphone in low light: grainy image, muted colors, visible noise, no cinematic grading.The audio contains multiple layered sounds: loud rain hitting the microphone, gunfire, distant explosions, car alarms, shouting soldiers, and frightened civilians speaking Polish in a spontaneous, chaotic manner. Voices are panicked and overlapping, with phrases like “Uciekaj!”, “Boże, co to jest?!”, “Tam! Tam leci!”, “Biegnij!”, “Zamknij drzwi!”, “O nie, o nie…!”. These should sound like real people in panic, recorded live in the street, not like scripted or studio-recorded lines. Wind causes occasional microphone distortion.No background music. No ASMR-style effects. The entire scene should feel raw, unstable, and uncontrolled, as if captured by a terrified bystander.
